title: Account Hacked and Restored
body:
Was really quite worried, but Riot was super quick and helpful wanted to give a shoutout to Riot Support for their assistance.

Also a warning for people to be careful and change their passwords or check if their emails have been changed on their accounts.

**_THANKS RIOT SUPPORT, YOU GUYS ARE GREAT!!!!!_**

replies.body: Who was the agent by chance? I'd love to give them a shoutout ^_^!
